item.title: Solving Minesweeper using Z3 SMT solver
item.description: This program solves a 9x9 minesweeper grid it can also be tried for other lengths.

item.title: Finding Prime Factors of a Large Number using Z3 SMT Solver [Recursive Approach]
item.description: This program finds the prime factors for very large numbers. I have written two approaches to solve this particular problem, this is the second approach.
